data.name: Purrrfect Love
data.detailed_description:
üíüCHECK THIS OUT!üíü

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2053940/


About the Game

‚ô•Sometimes she's naughty and sometimes she's cute... sometimes she's sexy and enthralling to boot. Create your own story of true, purrrfect love...‚ô•
*Made by Unity & Fungus.

‚ô•Story Summary‚ô•

One day, you come across a woman hanging around your house. Though you've never seen her before, as soon as she sees you a smile shines upon her face.
"Finally, you're back! I've been waiting for so long!"

Who is she...? And why does she seem so familiar?
After a series of events, the two of you start living together, and as you get to know each other, things start heating up.

Like an adorable feline, she stays by your side, bringing you warmth and joy.
And yet, what lies hidden behind these unexpected delights is a shocking truth...

‚ô•Content‚ô•
A beautiful, visual novel of love... straight from the heart.

‚òÖOver 20 separate, exquisitely crafted CGs & animations.
‚ãÜMore than 50 shots total
‚ãÜ10 adult scenes
‚ãÜ10 precious moments

‚òÖA deep, moving story of true love
‚ãÜMain storyline consisting of 10 chapters
‚ãÜSpecial Halloween episode

‚òÖFull Japanese voice-acting for the female protagonist to really bring the story to life.
‚ãÜVoice actors that create lively, sexy vibes for your special cat lady.

‚òÖSuper unique character songs
‚ãÜSongs created by professional producers to bring you even closer to your girl.

‚ô•About us‚ô•
We're a cooperation between two studios that love making visual novels!

Once Only Studio
Adult manga artist Nekoi Hikaru takes the role of producer.
This work is an extension of the manga, and Yi-Guang has created all the art, visuals, and UI.

Dark Light Studio
Indie game producer C.moon is responsible for the script and coding,
and really strives to give each player a moving, literary experience.

data.short_description: ‚ô•Sometimes she's naughty and sometimes she's cute... sometimes she's sexy and enthralling to boot. Create your own story of true, throbbing love...‚ô• A beautiful, visual novel of love... straight from the soul. You're just dying to get those heartstrings plucked, aren't you?
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
